property.name: CardText
property.value: F: You and your opponent each discard 2 cards and then draw 2 cards. Guile/Charlie F: Discard the last card in your card pool. Reveal the top card of your deck. Until the end of the turn you may play the revealed card as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove this card from the game: After an attack is played, reduce that attack's damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block with this card, discard 1 card in either card pool that was played as a block this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack (not 1 of its Multiples) deals damage, take up to 2 block cards from your discard pile and add them to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take the previous card in your card pool and add it to the top of your deck face down. Guile E: Your opponent takes the last card in their card pool and adds it to the top of their deck face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: If this card deals damage, you may reduce the damage to 0. If you do, the next attack you play this turn gets +5 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, your opponent reveals their hand. You discard any number of cards from your hand. For each card you discard this way, choose 1 of your opponent's cards with the same type and discard it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard your hand: Your opponent discards their hand. Only playable if you have at least 1 card in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent attempts to block, they must choose 3 cards from their hand, you then choose 1 of these cards randomly. The chosen card is the card they must use if they attempt to block. If this card is not a block then they may not block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this card was played as a Reversal, take 2 block cards from your discard pile and add them to your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent places an attack into their card pool, but before they make a control check, return that attack to their hand and choose 1 random card from their hand. Your opponent must attempt to play that card into their card pool, if possible. If the card is impossible to play it is discarded and your opponent's combat phase ends if it is their turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: Before a control check is made, that check gets +2 or -1. R Commit, discard 2 momentum: After your opponent successfully plays a card into their card pool, discard that card with no effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Until the beginning of your next Ready Phase, your character gets the ability 'R Discard the top card of your deck: After you make a control check, that control check gets +1.'

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Until the beginning of your next Ready Phase, All attacks get the Reversal keyword.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Until the beginning of your next Ready Phase, cards are not placed into either player's staging area, discard pile, or momentum during the End Phase. They remain in their respective card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Until the beginning of your next Ready Phase, after an attack deals damage, immediately add it to the momentum of the player who played it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you pass a control check, place 1 Smash token on this card. F Commit, Remove 1 Smash token from this card: Ready any other card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Place a number of smash tokens on this card equal to the number of cards in your hand. Only playable while there are 0 smash tokens on this card. R Commit: After you make a control check for a block, you may remove Smash tokens from this card as if you were committing foundations to pay for the block. Only playable if you have more cards in your hand than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard X momentum: Place X Smash tokens on this card. Only playable if this card has 0 Smash tokens on it. E Remove 1 Smash token from this card: If your attack deals damage, gain 1 vitality.

property.value: E: If your opponent committed a foundation for the Stun of this attack they discard 1 card.
